name: Space drive beats
description:
Made by Plopsis, Title Pending and Jeremi360

Music and sounds were CC-0 and gathered from various places.

In intro screen use mouse to move. 

in 3d scene arrows or a/d  move the ship. Space to shoot. 

1-2 to change cameras.

5 to toggle music visualiser

Made for Music Game Jam 2018

https://itch.io/jam/musicgamejam2018
